short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert AIFF audio file to WAV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to convert AIFF to WAV?	 

1-Click extension icon - this will open AIFF to WAV online conversion website. 
2-Select AIFF file and click convert button. 
3-You will get your WAV file download link in your email address.
